About Rhythm

Rhythm is an app to help women understand how their menstrual cycle impacts their fitness and overall wellness.

The idea came about when we learned that 70%+ of physical science research is based on male subjects and that women perform better than men over ultramarathon distances.

It got us thinking - how many other sports can women outperform men in if we actually took the time to understand how menstrual cycles impact performance Rhythm is trying to answer this question.

We want to go beyond other apps and provide automated training adjustments based on your current physiology, and specific, measurable training targets adapted to your cycle phase.
